metadata.title: CVE-2012-3409 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
ecryptfs-utils: suid helper does not restrict mounting filesystems withnosuid,nodev which creates a possible privilege escalation

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3409` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ecryptfs-utils - 104-0ubuntu1.14.04.4
libecryptfs0 - 104-0ubuntu1.14.04.4
python-ecryptfs - 104-0ubuntu1.14.04.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ecryptfs-utils package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '104-0ubuntu1.14.04.4').
